enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Decisions FCCC/CP/1996/L.2 and L.14 take note of the Convention Secretariats impending move to Bonn and requests Parties to communicate to the Secretariat their designation of focal points, to enable the Secretariat to explore the cost and need to establish liaison arrangements in New York and Geneva.
